name: Ronald Isley
description: '''Ronald Isley''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|aɪ|z|l|i}} {{respell|EYEZ|lee}}; born May 21, 1941) is an American singer, songwriter, and record producer. Isley is the lead singer, a founding member, and last surviving original member of the family music group [[The Isley Brothers]].
